title: Using Azure Key Vaults for Connection settings
description: ADF linked services allow the use of Azure Key Vault for easy management of linked service settings. We suggest using Azure Key Vault to maintain safe handling of sensitive information. When possible, an Azure Key Vault tab will appear as an alternative to manually filling out connection settings.
